solution_line_template: If there are {num_notebooks} notebooks on the shelf, there are {more_pens_than_notebooks}+{num_notebooks} = <<{num_notebooks}+{more_pens_than_notebooks}={num_pens}>>{num_pens} pens on the shelf.
Altogether, Wesley has {num_pens}+{num_notebooks} = <<{num_pens}+{num_notebooks}={total_items}>>{total_items} notebooks and pens on the shelf.
